page.title: 12Private Transport.
page.content: Our area is linked easily to the{M1 at {Exits 35/36.}Major roads run through our area but due to school surveys and public protest a{3 ton weight limit exists, taking heavy traffic away from houses and schools. An area of mixed private and council housing and{80% of families own a car, 60% of these being British. The age of cars was difficult to establish, but it seems approximately{10% have a 'B' {registration.}Just under 50% are over 3 years old. Red and blue are popular colours. {28%}of the population use the M1 on a daily basis.{70%}of families use cars for shopping and pleasure and{61%}for work - some using public transport for work travel. Despite a growing population and major roads, only{3 {Petrol Filling Stations}serve our area, with 1 other servicing garage.
